ModMetaData.name: SRTS Expanded - Battlestar Galactica
ModMetaData.author: Capi
ModMetaData.description:
This mod adds ships from the Battlestar Galactica universe to SRTS Expanded. All ships have their own characteristics, size, speed, fuel capacity, power supply, and so on.
This mod is an add-on, which means that none of the original SRTS Expanded textures have been replaced.
All ships are searchable from the SRTS bar on the research page.
